```{r}

library(gapminder)
summary(gapminder)
Iran <- gapminder[which(gapminder$country=="Iran"),]
Asia <- gapminder[which(gapminder$continent=="Asia"),]
summary(Iran[,4:6])
mean(Iran$lifeExp)>mean(Asia$lifeExp)
mean(Iran$pop)>mean(Asia$pop)
mean(Iran$gdpPercap)>mean(Asia$gdpPercap)

```
